gen:link.msg:message: `MarketValue` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis` en `TypesOfRealEstateMember` en `NonDAEBActivitiesMember` MOET gelijk zijn aan `CommercialRealEstateInExploitation` zonder `ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis` en `TypesOfRealEstateMember` en met `SeparateMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set01MarketValue')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set01MarketValue return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set02CommercialRealEstateInExploitation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set02CommercialRealEstateInExploitation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
